alert.note: Alert for Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 2:05AM MST until January 31 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches with locally higher amounts over the West Elks. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph mainly above 10000 feet. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains and Uncompahgre Plateau and Dallas Divide. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on icy to snowpacked road conditions. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; Uncompahgre Plateau, Dallas Divide; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
